## SentEthersLiquityTransaction.waitForReceipt() method

Wait for the transaction to be mined, and check whether it was successful.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
waitForReceipt(): Promise<MinedReceipt<EthersTransactionReceipt, T>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[MinedReceipt](./lib-base-u.minedreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;[EthersTransactionReceipt](./lib-ethers-u.etherstransactionreceipt.md)<!-- -->, T&gt;&gt;

Either a [FailedReceipt](./lib-base-u.failedreceipt.md) or a [SuccessfulReceipt](./lib-base-u.successfulreceipt.md)<!-- -->.

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers-u.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) if the transaction is cancelled or replaced.
